Headline: #126 Jackson Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Jackson/Ashland
ShortDescription: Eastbound 126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Jackson, Ashland, Congress, Loomis and Jackson due to street blockage near Jackson/Ashland.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Jackson, Ashland, Congress, Loomis and Jackson due to street blockage near Jackson/Ashland.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #66 Chicago Temporary Reroute near Chicago/Orleans
ShortDescription: 66 Chicago buses rerouted EB via Chicago, Sedgwick, Superior, Wells & Chicago; WB via Chicago, Wells, Huron, Sedgwick & Chicago due to blockage nr Chgo/Orleans.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#66 Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near Chicago/Orleans.

  • Eastbound via Chicago, Sedgwick, Superior, Wells and Chicago.
  • Westbound via Chicago, Wells, Huron, Sedgwick and Chicago.

Allow extra travel time.
